message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob, but $90 is just too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $105?
I can do $95, that's the best I can do
